install.name: chronocontact
install.author: ChronoEngine.com
install.description: This mambot must have ChronoForms component in order for it to work. You just need to put the name of the form you want to show between : {chronocontact}&{/chronocontact}, Example: {chronocontact}form1{/chronocontact} where form1 is the form name which will be displayed!!
